duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive marketing strategies to enhance brand visibility and promote waste-to-energy solutions.
Lead a team of marketing specialists, fostering collaboration and guiding their efforts towards achieving set community outreach goals.
Analyze market trends, community behavior, and competitor activity to identify engagement opportunities and refine strategies.
Manage the company's online presence, optimizing the website and social media channels for maximum community engagement.
Plan and oversee participation in community events, conferences, and trade shows to showcase environmental solutions and network with stakeholders.
Measure and report on the performance of community outreach campaigns, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Environmental Science, Political Science, Communications, or related field (Master's preferred)
